content.College Info: SKUAST Jammu, located in Jammu, is a prestigious A NAAC accredited government institution offering world-class agricultural university programs. The college is known for its excellent academic standards, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and strong industry connections. Students gain admission through University Entrance and benefit from experienced faculty, modern laboratories, and comprehensive learning resources. The institution maintains high placement rates and provides students with opportunities for research, internships, and skill development programs.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • B.Sc. (Hons) Agriculture
  • B.Sc. (Hons) Biotechnology
  • B.V.Sc. & A.H
  • M.Sc. Agriculture & Allied Sciences (Agricultural Economics, Genetics & Plant Breeding, Entomology, Plant Pathology, Soil Science, Horticulture)
  • M.V.Sc.
  • MBA Agri-Business
  • Ph.D. in Agriculture, Veterinary & Basic Sciences
  • Diploma in Basic Agriculture and Horticulture Training
